original_text: And David was angry because the Lord had broken out against Uzzah. And that place is called Perez-uzza to this day.
korean_text: 여호와께서 웃사의 몸을 찢으셨으므로 다윗이 노하여 그 곳을 베레스 웃사라 부르니 그 이름이 오늘까지 이르니라

sentences.original_text: because the Lord had broken out against Uzzah
And that place is called Perez-uzza
